item.sculk_items.echo_lighter.tooltip: Used to activate the End Portal.
enchantment.sculk_items.occlusion.desc: Cancels out most vibrations caused by the wearer.
text.autoconfig.sculk_items.title: Sculk Items Config
text.autoconfig.sculk_items.option.requi: Whether or not the Sculk Lighter is required to light the End Portal
text.autoconfig.sculk_items.option.spawn: Whether or not the Occlusion Enchantment will spawn in Ancient City chests
text.autoconfig.sculk_items.option.playe: Whether or not Sculk Sensors will only detect player footsteps if a Note Block is under it
